textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from Jul 2015 to -- Scientific collaborator on mobile trustworthy face and speaker recognition. Involved in the project Google AS and TeSLA. Sushil Bhattacharjee grew up in India. He received a PhD from the Signal Processing Lab at EPFL in 1999, on the subject of content based image retrieval. Since then he has held R&D positions at several Swiss companies, where he has worked on a range of topics including information retrieval, video-surveillance, and bank-note processing machines. He enjoys working on computer vision and machine learning applied to various problems.
